title: Julianne Moore is red hot in trouser suit as she reunites with Tom Ford at Vogue fashion conference
text:
Julianne Moore was a scene-stealing presence at Vogue's 3rd Annual Forces of Fashion Conference in New York on Thursday.

The Oscar-winning 58-year-old actress modeled an oxblood velvet Tom Ford jacket over a silk cashmere turtleneck and gleaming scarlet slacks.

She could be glimpsed mingling outside the event with Tom himself, who was classically elegant in a black suit from his own line.

Hello, gorgeous: Julianne Moore was a scene-stealing presence at Vogue's 3rd Annual Forces of Fashion Conference in New York on Thursday

He kept the top couple of buttons of his white dress shirt beguilingly undone and modeled a pair of shades from his Private Collection.

Julianne, who was in Tom's directorial debut A Single Man a decade ago, enjoyed an onstage conversation with him at the conference on Thursday.

'As an actor, there’s nothing worse than a friend of yours saying: "Hey, I have a script,"' Julianne said onstage, according to Vogue.

'Tom and I ran into each other at the Met, and I asked how his movie was going, and he said: "Can I send you the script?" I thought, Oh no. But he sent it to me and I read it, and it was absolutely perfect,' she remembered.

Fab: She could be glimpsed mingling outside the event with Tom Ford, who was classically elegant in a black suit from his own line

Sensation: The Oscar-winning 58-year-old actress modeled an oxblood velvet Tom Ford jacket over a silk cashmere turtleneck and gleaming scarlet slacks

Julianne also dished: 'When I first met Tom, it was in 1998; it was the first time I was nominated for an Academy Award. My baby was two months old.'

She allowed: 'I wasn’t really in Tom Ford shape. I came into the Beverly Hills Hotel and I was really nervous because I was going to meet this giant of American fashion, and here I am with my baby. The first thing Tom did was pick up my little boy - who’s now 21 - and said: "I want one of these."'

Tom, who shares his seven-year-old son Jack with his husband Richard Buckley, added a button to Julianne's story: 'I finally have one.'

Plug: Tom kept the top couple of buttons of his white dress shirt beguilingly undone and modeled a pair of shades from his Private Collection

Collaborators: Julianne, who was in Tom's directorial debut A Single Man a decade ago, enjoyed an onstage conversation with him at the conference on Thursday

'Of all the people that I know and I’ve worked with, I get asked about [Tom] more than anybody else. [He’s] someone who has achieved so much,' said Julianne.

'People admire him, and they’re like: "Who is this guy? What is the mystery of Tom Ford?" He’s much more human, normal, and easy than you would imagine.'

She said of her longtime friend: 'Tom is direct. He gives you the information. You say: "Tom, I don’t know what to wear," and he’ll say: "You need to wear this. The armhole is too big. The neck should be here on you."'

Photographer Corey Tenold captured the conference for Vogue, including a stage talk starring Cindy Crawford and her daughter Kaia Gerber.
description: Julianne Moore was a scene-stealing presence at Vogue's 3rd Annual Forces of Fashion Conference in New York on Thursday.
